settings.title: Overview
settings.text: Our Amanita Muscaria capsules reduce stress and lift your mood. This special mushroom promotes balance and calm, perfect for managing stress and improving well-being. Encapsulated in a natural, plant-based form, Amanita Muscaria supports a peaceful state of mind

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.text: Organic Lion's Mane Extract (standardized to contain 31% Beta-Glucan)(Hericium erinaceus)(Fruiting Body), Pullulan Capsule

settings.title: Directions
settings.text: A bottle includes 60 capsules. You can take them whenever it suits you, either with food or on an empty stomach

settings.heading: safe and organic
settings.text: Our mushrooms are as organic as grandma’s home-baked cookies. Grown without any nasty chemicals, we ensure that each mushroom is rigorously tested and safe for consumption.

settings.question: Are your products safe?
settings.answer: The recommended dosage is on the package. Usually, you take them once or twice a day with meals. But for the best results, just follow the instructions on the label. Easy peasy!

settings.title: As a student, I deal with a lot of stress. One day, I decided to try Amanita muscaria, and I don't regret it.
settings.text: My stress levels have dropped, my concentration has improved, and studying has become easier.
settings.name: Pavlo Anderson

settings.title: I was initially skeptical about an all-natural product, given the mixed reviews, but I decided to give it a shot.
settings.text: I'm glad I did because I've noticed a significant boost in my energy levels and overall well-being."
settings.name: Anastasia Brown

settings.title: It seems to help with memory and cognition. I'll definitely buy it again.
settings.name: Dmitry Johnson

settings.title: I bought this product to support my immune system.
settings.text: Since taking it, my immune system has become much stronger, and I’m no longer catching every virus or bacteria that comes my way. I'm very happy with the results.
settings.name: Nadia Davis

settings.title: I’m a writer, and inspiration is essential for me to create and live.
settings.text: After hours of fruitless attempts to write something worthwhile, I realized it was time for a change. I highly recommend Amanita muscaria to fellow artists – it really helps.
settings.name: Peter Taylor
